Package it.unimi.dsi.law.warc.util

Interface Summary
DigestBasedDuplicateDetection Allows to determine if an HttpResponse is duplicate.
HttpResponse Provides high level access to WARC records with record-type equal to response and content-type equal to HTTP (or HTTPS).
Response Provides high level access to WARC records with record-type equal to response.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHttpResponse An abstract implementation of HttpResponse.
BasicHttpResponse Deprecated. As of release 1.3, replaced by MutableHttpResponse.
BURL A normalised, canonical URL.
ByteArrayCharSequence An adapter exposing a byte array as an ISO-8859-1-encoded character sequence.
MutableHttpResponse A mutable AbstractHttpResponse that allows to set all the fields.
RemappedStringMap A StringMap that remaps values returned by another StringMap.
Util Static utility methods.
WarcHttpResponse An AbstractHttpResponse implementation that reads the response content from a WARC record (via the WarcHttpResponse.fromWarcRecord(WarcRecord) method.
